text: L&G; may serve as an acronym for: * Ladies & Gentlemen, the Tokyo bedding company at the centre of the Enten controversy * Leather & Grace, an organization of Unitarian Universalists promoting awareness of BDSM and kink * Legal & General Group Plc, a multinational financial services company headquartered in the United Kingdom * Leisure and Gaming, a defunct online gambling holding company
title: L&G (disambiguation)
